# dance

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Dancing `r emo::ji("woman_dancing")` with the stats, aka `tibble()` dancing `r emo::ji("man_dancing")`. 

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(dance)
library(tidyselect)

g <- dplyr::group_by(iris, Species)
```
